author: Fabio Bucchieri
comment: Very cool and useful app  Can't say much yet about the prediction but everything else works really nice. Only suggestion is to add some greyed-out vertical lines in the graphs to improve readability.

reply.author: Reza Rawassizadeh
reply.content: Hi Fabio, thank you for your comment, it gives us lots of energy :)  We have tried those grey lines, but GUIs are scaled on different watches and on some low resolution watches they will be disappeared. Let us think  and experiment more, we might find a good solution for it.

author: Elaheh Momeni
comment: I use the fitness and heart-rate prediction. Both provide very good and informative feedback.

author: Zohre Javaheri
comment: One of the best app I have installed on my smartwatch.
title: Very useful, especially battery visualization made me very happy

author: Biok Barabi
comment: Greate UI, simple and easy to use!
title: Lovely and applicable
